body: Yeah - the concern about excluding it using tf_tests.cmake is Bazel OSS builds, because the non-test code in debug_io_util.cc are guarded with PLATFORM_GOOGLE. I guess it's better to submit this change from internal remove this test file from OSS altogether for now. WDYT?
body_html: Yeah - the concern about excluding it using tf_tests.cmake is Bazel OSS builds, because the non-test code in debug_io_util.cc are guarded with PLATFORM_GOOGLE. I guess it's better to submit this change from internal remove this test file from OSS altogether for now. WDYT?
